angle.headline: Insider Exclusive: SB60 Security to Deploy AI-Powered Perimeter Monitoring
angle.angle: My sources reveal that the expanded security perimeter for Super Bowl LX will incorporate AI-powered monitoring. Expect real-time analysis of crowd behavior and automated threat detection. This is a game-changer for stadium security.
angle.topic: Super Bowl 60 Security and Emergency Preparedness in the Bay Area
